name: Danganronpa: Abandoned Lights Prologue
description:
16 former students get called back to their school that they used to go.

But as they go there, things escalate pretty quickly.

This is just a fan project, it has nothing to do with the official series.

Gameplay time: It takes like..38-43 minutes to play it through.

Don't steal or trace the sprites and the backgrounds, or I'll break your knees.

Since I forgot to add the credits to the files, I'm including it in the files here, no need to download.

Also, if an error appears, then sorry, but idk what to do, I'm not a technician.

Also one quick thing: Some of the scenes there have a different quality than the rest of the game, because it was done on different device and I cannot do anything with that
